Description.Name: Hookworms Highwaymen
Description.Details: The original hookworms escaped Araxis after Grim Sybil was killed liberating the Argo. Silas Black created The Hookworms but were eventually hunted down and destroyed by a special Ops force from the Aurigan Coalition. Those that escaped are the remnants of the orginal band. And with new ‘recruits’ have formed a roving band to continue their harassing ways.
